description: Details required for condition 5 (Fire Safety Strategy) of planning permission 22/00968/HOU (Erection of single storey front and side extension, installation of 1 no front and 1 no side rooflights and internal alteration)
decision_conditions: Condition 5 of Planning Permission 22/00968/HOU requires the submission of the following information 1) suitably positioned outside space for fire appliances/ an evacuation assembly point; 2) Appropriate fire alarm systems; 3) Passive and active fire safety measures; 4) appropriate construction details to minimise the risk of fire spread; 5) provision of suitable and convenient means of escape/ an evacuation strategy;6) provision of suitable access and equipment for firefighting which is appropriate for the size and use of the development. The Fire Safety Strategy shall include a statement of competence. The information submitted does not meaningfully engage with the requirements of the planning condition. For example the following statement does not address the point of the condition "not relevant - family members will agree this as common sense."Fire Safety is clearly an important issue and a detailed, but proportionate response is required. I note the submission references Town and Country Planning Development Management Procedure Order 11(3)(c) - this relates to the submission of Planning Applications, not applications made under a planning condition.The applicant is requested to resubmit with a detailed response to the points set out in Condition 5 of Planning Permission 22/00968/HOU.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
